collection.name: Shelter from the 27th of March
collection.openText: It literally becomes, "The safest place on Earth."

specialTipSize.specialTip: The subject who enters the $0 becomes Immune to all types of damage. (However, the effect does not apply to damage caused by O-09-91.) Also, their HP and SP will slowly heal from the moment they enter the $0.
If the subject enters the $0 and was being pursued, they will become undetectable to the pursuer.

If a subject remains inside the $0 for longer than 30 seconds, the Cliport counter of Abnormality inside the facility will become 0. Such a phenomenon will repeatedly happen around other Containment Units until the subject leaves the $0.
